subject: Re: [perl #41874] [PATCH] extended io_mmap implementation
body:
chromatic wrote:
> 
> Allison, what do you think about holding onto this one until the revised IO 
> PDD gets finished?

The revised IO PDD is finished, just not implemented. Go ahead and check 
the mmap io layer in, we'll port it to the new system when we implement it.

Also convert the test PIR file to a test.

Allison
